attributes.action: remove control over pay & expenses from MP's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current system of pay and expenses has been created by the very politicians that are now trying to "fix" it. This will not engender trust from the public and they should play no part in the reform of the system.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
